column1: The House of the Hammer of Wrath was one of the Twelve Houses of the Gondolindrim of Gondolin whose lord was Rog.  They were great smiths and craftsmen
column2: and revered Aulë. In battle they carried great maces like hammers
column4: for they had strong arms.  The device of this people was the Stricken Anvil
column5: and a hammer that smites sparks about it; this was set upon their shields
column6: for red gold and black iron was their delight.  They had a great hatred for Morgoth and the Balrogs
column7: and during the Fall of Gondolin they slew a number of the fell beasts
column8: being the first of Elves and Men alike to slay a balrog. All of them perished in that battle
column9: when a large force of Balrogs
column10: Orcs and Fire-drakes was unleashed upon them.
